title: 14 day ban in past , will i still get my rewards for being Gold 5 ?
body: I have over 600 games into ranked for this season alone , and that's within a 6 month span as i started late spring/early summer , I think it's a bit harsh to punish people who have gotten them in the past due to mishaps or mistakes because as you all say , yes . League is an extremely competitive game . So i would love to know if there is any way to get my rewards still because i have tried and i love this game to the fullest and am passionate about playing it . Which is why i want the rewards for trying my absolute best and hardest out here on the rift . Heck , even the border would be sufficient ! I don't play graves at all haha .

replies.body: The season ended a couple weeks ago, and rewards have rolled out.  There were quite a few requirements for the 2017 season rewards, but our [ranked eligibility guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility) can help clear things up.  If you were disqualified for 2017 season, you can aim to be a more honorable player in 2018 season whenever that begins.
